data.text: @whatitisB These types of policies aren't new. Medical workers in all settings have an ethical and professional obligation to their patients, and getting vaccinated is part of the health care ethic. That’s why 96% of physicians are fully vaccinated: https://t.co/VnW2XsdG0Z

@EllRay7 Not sure where you're reading this information, would love to take a look. What we know is that all of the authorized or approved COVID-19 vaccines decrease your chance of serious illness, hospitalization, and death from COVID-19. Here’s some proof: https://t.co/jQEAscGGgZ

@EllRay7 These types of policies aren't new. Medical workers in all settings have an ethical and professional obligation to their patients, and getting vaccinated is part of the health care ethic. That’s why 96% of physicians are fully vaccinated: https://t.co/VnW2XsdG0Z
@ThisIsOurShot @DrPanMD Then stop firing them for refusing the risk of covid vaccinations.
